r.d: Allow one to use htaccess-like file to configure PHP per directory, just like apache's htaccess. It is especially usefull with fastcgi. This package was originally developed by Bart Vanbrabant. Old versions are available from: http://files.zoeloelip.be/htscanne
r.n: - Initial PECL relase - Added safe mode and openbasedir checks - use PHP streams instead of std IO - Fixed segfault in the parsing routines - Fixed CWD detections in threaded environments
